Subject: Possible new features/modules

Hi all

I wrote a module which detects the "real" media type (mime type) of a 
file based on the magic number approach.
At the moment I am comparing the Apache Tika library[1] and the Aduna 
Aperture library in terms of detection runtime and mime type coverage.

If there is an interest in the heritrix community for this module I 
would like to share or commit the code (but I would need some advices 
how to do it).

I am also working in a project[3] that tries to predict the media type 
of extracted links based on information extracted from URI, link 
position and content-type response header field.
At the moment I try to integrate this into heritrix to be able to 
perform a kind of document media type focused crawling.
Is there any interest  in the community in these kind of focus crawling?


best juergen







[1] http://incubator.*apache*.org/*tika*/
[2]http://www.aduna-software.com/technologies/aperture/overview.view
[3]http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/iel5/4577854/4577855/04577883.pdf
